description: I have worked with several multinational companies as a Data Engineer and Analyst, gaining valuable experience solving real-world data challenges.

experiences.title: Data Engineer
experiences.description: Improved data processing efficiency and quality by leading the development and automation of scalable data pipelines and workflows. Enabled reliable, real-time data insights through optimized architecture, storage, and collaborative solutions.

experiences.title: Data Analyst
experiences.description: Worked with SAP financial data using SQL and Tableau to boost data accuracy and retrieval speed, helping the business gain timely insights and make more informed decisions while ensuring data reliability.
